desc: Mosquitoes are back. We have YOUR back! We formulate DEET-free all natural insect repellents and use the best plant-oils and proteins. kE Labs is innovative Ento-science company, driven by technology protect people, pets and the planet against the flying insects. kiteproducts.com

layout.text: Mosquitoes are BACK! Get Outside! We have YOUR back!

Kite Entomology Laboratories specializes in formulating an advanced flying insect repulsion technology that makes you invisible to flying insects, like mosquitoes.
Our  Entomology-Science  based, non-synthetic plant-oil & protein formulations are a combination of molecular biology and biochemical assays. We target and manipulate the sensor arrays  (smell-neurons) and sensory-antennae systems on flying insects with eco-friendly and organic formulations.
We scramble their radar! Making you invisible to them!
Our formulations are pesticide-free, herbicide-free, insecticide-free, DEET-free & climate-friendly.
Our products are third-party tested proven effective!
